A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The film I have been waiting for.  This IS the heart and souls of what \"Star Wars\" set out to establish forty years ago.  The characters are deep and complex\, the dialogue is wonderful\, and the fact that I have strong women to identify with (a beautifully strong Asian woman playing a fantastic character?! YES BESH!!) is remarkable.  What we are seeing here is a rebirth and I cannot recommend it enough.  Rian Johnson\, thank you!
